### Hi, I'm Serghey!👋
⚡ I'm Serghey Potapov, junior front-end developer. I love traveling and reading. Extreamly enjoy to communicate with people.

💼 I am currently actively looking for opportunities to grow and develop as a professional programmer. My dream is to join a creative team, where I can contribute and constantly learn new technologies.

📫 Ready for open communication and the opportunity to discuss how I can add value to your team. You can contact me via [![Telegram](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/f27e49f6c63a962dad03b1465e818dfd079dc668654c2b792d9318614014eeb7/68747470733a2f2f696d672e736869656c64732e696f2f62616467652f54656c656772616d2d2532333030383843432e7376673f6c6f676f3d54656c656772616d266c6f676f436f6c6f723d7768697465)](https://t.me/PotapSS).
